title: MiliMil
author: MiliMil
content: Hi guys,If you followed my previous topic about how I turned over a million dollars plus with no bonus from the sportsbook (https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5434831.msg61599879#msg61599879) you may be interested in this thread.I closed my account with the above sportsbook and was going through my account history and found this bet I placed two years ago.I spent many hours researching and selected 19 legs that I liked. I placed $300 and collected $417,000. I only chose sports that I have a high knowledge of and tried to bet with no emotion. The first match was a rugby game on the 18th of September 2020 and the last match was a futures bet for Kansas City Chiefs to win their conference and make the Super Bowl on the 18th of January 2021. I told a group of my friends to copy my bet but they were impatient and didn't want to wait four months. Only one of my friends followed my bet and he placed $100 which won him just under $140,000. I live in Australia so a lot of the matches were Australian Rugby games.The bet was originally worth $686,000 but Niko Price could only manage a draw against Donald Cerrone (after having a point deducted for a BS accidental eye poke) so the UFC match was voided and my winnings decreased to $417,000.I find sometimes it is best to place future bets instead of match bets if you can find some value. I have a few similar bets which won $644,000 and $258,000 so I will try to find them and post it shortly.Always remember to only bet what you can afford to lose and gamble responsibly.   Main bet: https://imgur.com/a/v8rAEV7Breakdown of individual legs:https://imgur.com/a/SDuZbbvhttps://imgur.com/a/NhOSyejhttps://imgur.com/a/GnYGjFWhttps://imgur.com/a/wEkVnkk

comments.author: mindrust
comments.body: Amazing story. These are the stories that make people play even more because you cannot know when will you hit the jackpot and wake up a millionaire the next day.Freebitco.in also have these bets for the events in the far future (like the elections) and I played them before. They work flawlessly. If you are into that kind of betting, you should try them.

comments.author: pawanjain
comments.body: Wow, you must be really lucky to have won such a huge reward. This shows that you must be really knowledgeable in Australian rugby games.I hope you took the profits out while it lasted and enjoyed the rewards.Many people keep playing even after they have won a huge reward and then end up losing money which I guess you wouldn't have done since you are wise.By the way, what did you do with such a huge reward ?

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: Quote from: MiliMil on February 25, 2023, 03:24:54 AMMain bet: Breakdown of individual legs:Congratulations, you were so lucky! Almost a perfect row of bets! It's like winning the lottery prize. The chances were really low, and that is what made it possible for you to turn 300$ bucks into a 417,000$ fortune. I imagine your friends are really regretful for not taking your advice into consideration back then. I guess it was a chance in a lifetime they lost in gambling...

comments.author: Don Pedro Dinero
comments.body: Contratulations. Are you a millionaire? I suppose so, for the gains you tell us you have made. Some people go crazy with money and betting and end up losing their winnings and more, but it doesn't seem to be your case.Quote from: MiliMil on February 25, 2023, 03:24:54 AMI have a few similar bets which won $644,000 and $258,000 so I will try to find them and post it shortly.We look forward to those stories with screenshots

comments.author: MiliMil
comments.body: Quote from: mindrust on February 25, 2023, 03:57:29 AMAmazing story. These are the stories that make people play even more because you cannot know when will you hit the jackpot and wake up a millionaire the next day.Freebitco.in also have these bets for the events in the far future (like the elections) and I played them before. They work flawlessly. If you are into that kind of betting, you should try them.I have a few bets totalling over $30,000 on Donald Trump to win the Republican Nomination next year. I think he will comfortably beat DeSantis so fingers crossed.

comments.author: Fiatless
comments.body: Congratulations, this is great news. Turning $300 to $417,000 is a big deal. You are just so lucky because this win is more than people's annual salary. Most people have been playing for many years and have never won half of what they have gotten. I hope you will maximize your win. Thank you for also telling us to play responsibly. Enjoy your win  Donald Trump will easily win the Republican presidential primaries because he has more supporter that sees him as a hero than any other Republican.

comments.author: MiliMil
comments.body: Quote from: pawanjain on February 25, 2023, 04:03:13 AMWow, you must be really lucky to have won such a huge reward. This shows that you must be really knowledgeable in Australian rugby games.I hope you took the profits out while it lasted and enjoyed the rewards.Many people keep playing even after they have won a huge reward and then end up losing money which I guess you wouldn't have done since you are wise.By the way, what did you do with such a huge reward ?I placed $115,000 on Novak to win the Australian Open which was delayed by few weeks because of COVID. My total withdrawal after Novak won was just under $550,000. I invested half of it in real estate, paid off my parents mortgage which was $81,000 and kept the rest in high interest term deposits.

comments.author: MiliMil
comments.body: Quote from: uneng on February 25, 2023, 04:19:15 AMQuote from: MiliMil on February 25, 2023, 03:24:54 AMMain bet: Breakdown of individual legs:Congratulations, you were so lucky! Almost a perfect row of bets! It's like winning the lottery prize. The chances were really low, and that is what made it possible for you to turn 300$ bucks into a 417,000$ fortune. I imagine your friends are really regretful for not taking your advice into consideration back then. I guess it was a chance in a lifetime they lost in gambling...I appreciate you posting the pictures, I am still a junior member and don't have enough merit to post them so thank you for that.I took the day off work on the last match (Kansas City Chiefs vs Buffalo Bills) and my friends and I watched it live. We then went to the best steakhouse in Sydney and I spent over $1500 on dinner and alcohol. I also gave them $2000 each in cash the same night so they were happy.

comments.author: Fiatless
comments.body: Quote from: MiliMil on February 25, 2023, 04:39:04 AMQuote from: pawanjain on February 25, 2023, 04:03:13 AMWow, you must be really lucky to have won such a huge reward. This shows that you must be really knowledgeable in Australian rugby games.I hope you took the profits out while it lasted and enjoyed the rewards.Many people keep playing even after they have won a huge reward and then end up losing money which I guess you wouldn't have done since you are wise.By the way, what did you do with such a huge reward ?I placed $115,000 on Novak to win the Australian Open which was delayed by few weeks because of COVID. My total withdrawal after Novak won was just under $550,000. I invested half of it in real estate, paid off my parents mortgage which was $81,000 and kept the rest in high interest term deposits.You keep on winning and winning always. It's like you have so much experience in gambling. Paying off your parent's mortgage was a very good idea, you acted wisely. Investing in real estate is also wonderful because the price of houses always appreciates. But you didn't consider investing in bitcoin?

comments.author: MiliMil
comments.body: Quote from: Fiatless on February 25, 2023, 04:37:15 AMCongratulations, this is great news. Turning $300 to $417,000 is a big deal. You are just so lucky because this win is more than people's annual salary. Most people have been playing for many years and have never won half of what they have gotten. I hope you will maximize your win. Thank you for also telling us to play responsibly. Enjoy your win  Donald Trump will easily win the Republican presidential primaries because he has more supporter that sees him as a hero than any other Republican.I have so many bets like this but I am too lazy to find them. I will try to do it in the next few days. Unfortunately, I don't have enough merit so I can't post them directly and have to use imgur. Thanks for the kind words!

comments.author: MiliMil
comments.body: Quote from: Fiatless on February 25, 2023, 04:46:33 AMQuote from: MiliMil on February 25, 2023, 04:39:04 AMQuote from: pawanjain on February 25, 2023, 04:03:13 AMWow, you must be really lucky to have won such a huge reward. This shows that you must be really knowledgeable in Australian rugby games.I hope you took the profits out while it lasted and enjoyed the rewards.Many people keep playing even after they have won a huge reward and then end up losing money which I guess you wouldn't have done since you are wise.By the way, what did you do with such a huge reward ?I placed $115,000 on Novak to win the Australian Open which was delayed by few weeks because of COVID. My total withdrawal after Novak won was just under $550,000. I invested half of it in real estate, paid off my parents mortgage which was $81,000 and kept the rest in high interest term deposits.You keep on winning and winning always. It's like you have so much experience in gambling. Paying off your parent's mortgage was a very good idea, you acted wisely. Investing in real estate is also wonderful because the price of houses always appreciates. But you didn't consider investing in bitcoin???I live in Sydney, Australia and the real estate prices here are ridiculous especially since a lot of immigrants and Chinese in particular love Australia. I was already exposed to around $50,000USD in BTC in 2020 and only had one property so I thought buying another two would be the safer option. Judging by current BTC prices and average home prices in Sydney I think I made the correct decision.

comments.author: coinerer
comments.body: Quote from: MiliMil on February 25, 2023, 03:24:54 AMCongratulations you are very lucky.  Such cases are not seen often. Winning a million dollars with just $300 is not an easy win. Gambling is not for everyone and not everyone has this big win on their forehead very few gamblers have this big win on their forehead and you are one of them. I advise you to withdraw these amounts to invest in various businesses and various potential assets without using them again for gambling and avoid betting large amounts later on in the temptation of gambling or else you will lose these big winnings.  It won't take long to lose

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: Quote from: MiliMil on February 25, 2023, 04:36:27 AMQuote from: mindrust on February 25, 2023, 03:57:29 AMAmazing story. These are the stories that make people play even more because you cannot know when will you hit the jackpot and wake up a millionaire the next day.Freebitco.in also have these bets for the events in the far future (like the elections) and I played them before. They work flawlessly. If you are into that kind of betting, you should try them.I have a few bets totalling over $30,000 on Donald Trump to win the Republican Nomination next year. I think he will comfortably beat DeSantis so fingers crossed.Good luck with that. Congratulations on the long parlay though, that's a big win. I mostly see this kind of bet with only less than $100 amount but you went further into putting $300 in a risky parlay and I think the courage is what I love about that. It's not easy to release that kind of amount, especially in a very long parlay, it could go south at any game like those with 1.82 to 3.64 odds. I bet that is really your lucky day and will be one of the unforgettable moments in your life. Thanks for sharing, this got me pumped up.

comments.author: slapper
comments.body: Wow, that's an incredible win! Congratulations on your past success. It's impressive that you were able to carefully research and select the sports that you have high knowledge of, and bet without emotions. I hope you were able to take out the profits while it lasted and enjoy the rewards. It's true that many people continue playing even after a big win and end up losing more money than they won, so it's wise to be careful. Such an inspiring story from you. The more we learn and plan, the more chance we can beat FATE

comments.author: michellee
comments.body: That is an amazing story where you managed to turn $300 into $417,000. Not many gamblers can get big wins like you and this is amazing.You have done the right thing by investing your money in real estate and high interest term deposits. That will add to your wealth and can provide additional benefits for you. But maybe you can invest a bit in bitcoin to add to your list of investments on the internet and I think it's worth it.

comments.author: NAPK1NS_RA3
comments.body: Nobody believe this post. OP tried getting me to place a bet for him on Djokovic so he could keep 15% of my winnings. He most certainly did not win that parlay, likely edited. His goal is unknown but everyone should take what he says with a grain of salt. Edit: He also seems to prey on gambling addicts, tries to say all the right things in order to make you trust him, I almost fell for it (out of desperation).

comments.author: Kemarit
comments.body: Congrats mate, yeah familiar with your previous post and you just proved how insane or how big you are a bettor is. It's worth that you mentioned that we shouldn't be emotional and just go with the flow and see if you can hit that massive odds stack against you.Others might not have the courage to bet that odds though. But in any case, that's what the very definition of gambling, parlay with a good amount of money and then with some luck on your side, huge outcome.

comments.author: klidex

To me, he deserved to win the last election too but somehow that demented fuck won it without even leaving his basement. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ Well... shit happens.Hopefully this time we will get it right.
